# emitterSize

**Instance Property**

Determines the size of the particle emitter shape. Animatable.

## Declaration

```swift
var emitterSize: CGSize { get set }
```

## Discussion

How the emitter size is applied depends on the emitter shape. See [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/emitter-shape] for details. Depending on the value of [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAEmitterLayer/emitterShape], this value may be ignored.

Default is `0.0`.

## Emitter Geometry

- **renderMode**: Defines how particle cells are rendered into the layer.
- **emitterPosition**: The position of the center of the particle emitter. Animatable.
- **emitterShape**: Specifies the emitter shape.
- **emitterZPosition**: Specifies the center of the particle emitter shape along the z-axis. Animatable.
- **emitterDepth**: Determines the depth of the emitter shape.
